aboutme.title: About Me
aboutme.description: I was born in San Vicente, a town in the south of Buenos Aires, and I currently live in Lanús. I'm 23 years old and have been developing since I was 18. In my daily work, I contribute as a Front-End Developer at Adviters. In the future, I aim to become an independent developer, which is why I'm constantly improving my technology stack.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: Here you can see some of the projects I've worked on. I've highlighted three of the most important ones, but you can find all of them

techs.title: Skills and Experience with Technologies
techs.description: My experience is currently focused on Front-End development and design. These are some of the technologies I have mastered along the way:
techs.description2: I’ve implemented CI/CD pipelines in React and React Native projects, and I understand the App Store/Play Store ecosystems, their configuration, and the entire process for publishing mobile applications. I correctly apply the fundamentals of testing, including unit and integration testing in projects.

contact.description: What would you do if you had a Front-End expert at your disposal?
